an3.5:1.3: Ayoniso panham katta hoti, ayoniso panham vissajjeta hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso panham vissajjitam parimandalehi padabyanjanehi silitthehi upagatehi nabbhanumodita hoti.
an3.5:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato balo veditabbo.
an3.5:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito veditabbo.
an3.5:2.3: Yoniso panham katta hoti, yoniso panham vissajjeta hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso panham vissajjitam parimandalehi padabyanjanehi silitthehi upagatehi abbhanumodita hoti.
an3.5:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato pandito veditabbo.
